alert.note: Alert for Clark; Codington; Day; Deuel; Grant; Hamlin; Marshall; Roberts (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 12 at 1:54AM MST until December 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM CST TUESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM TUESDAY TO 6 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Ice Storm Warning, significant icing expected. Ice accumulations of two tenths to four tenths of an inch. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northeast South Dakota. * WHEN...For the Ice Storm Warning, from noon today to 6 PM CST Tuesday. For the Winter Storm Warning, from 6 PM Tuesday to 6 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
